column3: How many times have you watched this movie?
column4: How did the movie make you feel?
column5: How effectively did the movie portray the challenges faced by children with dyslexia?
column6: How do you feel about the way the film addressed the Indian education system and parental pressure?
column7: Share your overall thoughts or review of the movie in your own words.
column9: How would you rate Taare Zameen Par on a scale of 1 to 5?

column7: Good
A must watch movie that is socially important. It changes our perceptions of childhood, parenting, and schooling
It was average good.
It shows how parents are forcing childrens to be good in studies in terms of marks and not taking care of childs mental health.Not letting them do that they can be good at.

Taare zameen par is not only a movie but very powerful  lesson oriented picture  for all time all age groups. This movie delivers a message that promotes awareness and understanding of learning disabilities while celebrating each child's individuality. Overall, Taare Zameen Par is a must-watch, not only for parents and educators but for anyone who believes in the importance of empathy and acceptance. It is a heartwarming, inspirational film that sheds light on the impact of compassionate teaching, making it an unforgettable cinematic experience.

It was a perfect story to teach us lot of small and big things. Big things being dyslexia and parental pressure in indian society, but also the it subtly showed us the life, difficulty and hope for mentally retarded children. On top of everything, the amir khan's character taught us empathy.

Taare Zameen Par really hit me hard. Watching Ishaan go through so much just because no one understood him felt so real. It made me think about how many kids go through the same silently. The way the teacher believed in him was honestly beautiful. It's a movie that stays with you.
Taare Zameen Par is a heart-touching and thought-provoking film that beautifully portrays the struggles of a child with dyslexia.
It was an absolutely amazing movie, people should definitely watch such movies and should be aware about the situation their child must be facing.
It was very educational and much needed for social awareness at the time. It was well portrayed.
Taare Zameen Par is a heartfelt and inspiring film that beautifully shows the importance of understanding and nurturing every child's unique abilities.

Taare Zameen Par is a heart-touching film that beautifully portrays the struggles of a dyslexic child.
It highlights the importance of understanding and nurturing each child's unique abilities.
Aamir Khan delivers a powerful message about empathy in education.
This film leaves a lasting impact and inspires change in how we view learning.
